headline: METTLER TOLEDO Announces Michael J. Tokich to Join Board of Directors
summary: COLUMBUS, Ohio, January 20, 2026--Mettler-Toledo International Inc. (NYSE: MTD) announced today that Michael J. Tokich has been appointed to its Board of Directors, effective February 5, 2026.
